mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.PROCESSFACTOR (MPSNO, PROCESSNO, FACTORNAME, FACTORVALUE) values (#{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factorname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factorvalue,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select MPSNO, PROCESSNO, FACTORNAME, FACTORVALUE from WISDOM.PROCESSFACTOR
